QuestData.Title: A Dance With Dragons
QuestData.Description: I must say I am impressed, $n.$b$bYou and your friend were able to fix a ley line, and you are not even dragons!$b$bYou both seem exhausted by this ordeal. Allow me to help you get back home.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Speak with Stellagosa to ride back to Shal'Aran.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Stellagosa to ride back to Shal'Aran.
QuestData.RewardText: That is quite the adventure you had. Thankfully we now have plenty of mana for the refugees. Thank you, $n.
